issue.title: implement `user-defined scan` feature
issue.body:
Add snapshot/bycontainer.go to implement 'user-defined' scan works.
User could choose a docker image(now the default registry to pull this image is: docker hub) and let Dockyard to scan his/her image/app/vm by running this image. 

Dockyard will start a scanning container by:
-  mount his/her image/app/vm directory to a certain directory inside container
-  pass the Dockyard server address, scan data type(dockerv1, appv1) and callbackID to the scanning process
- start the scanning process.  The last job of the scanning process is to POST the scanning result to Dockyard server by restful API.

issue.title: Tuf
issue.body:
two commits in this PR
- use docker native pkg (engine-client ) to start container
  
  this is used for content scan 
- update vendor package
  - add docker pkg
  - remove useless pkg, like codegang/cli
  - add missing pkgs

issue.title: add content scan regist models/handle
issue.body:
Two handlers/dbtables will be added to implement 'content scan'.
- Scan Register 
  
  A user could register a scan image to a 'namespace/repository',
  so every time this user push a new image(/vm/app) to the repo, the image will be scanned.
- Scan Task
  
  When an image(/vm/app) pushed to a repo, a scan task will be triggered.
  The scan container will scan the image(/vm/app) and send the result back to the 'callback' function.

Signed-off-by: liang chenye liangchenye@huawei.com

issue.title: finish encrypt support in both server and client
issue.body:
The encrypt feature is done!
- add encrypt option to meta struct and ArtifactV1
- add encrypt method in all the 'PUT' function, so when the server received a 'PUT' instruction,
  it will read the encrypt method and then encrypt the uploaded file.
- add a http req head field "Dockyard-Encrypt-Method" to both server and client
  Now we support 'none' and 'gpg'
- update all the unit test and integrate test cases and data.

Signed-off-by: liang chenye liangchenye@huawei.com

issue.title: move testcase and merge client code
issue.body:
The first commit is about move all test case into 'test/unit'.

The second commit is about merge client into main cmd.

Separate setting load into two parts:
1) load global setting 
this happens every time
2) load server setting & open database
this happens only when running dockyard web/oss/database/monitor mode,
it will not be load when running dockyard client or unit test

issue.title: merge server to router/handle
issue.body:
appv1 server side is now merged to  router/handle/module/models!

way to test it:
- add following settings to conf/runtime.conf just as I added to README.md

```
[updateserver]
keymanager = "local://tmp/containerops_keymanager_cache"
storage = "local://tmp/containerops_storage_cache"
```
- compile and run dockyard
- try to push a file

```
./dockyard web --port=1234
curl -d {"this is the test file"} --request PUT localhost:1234/app/v1/tn/tr/tos/tarch/tappname
```
- then we can see files under `/tmp/containerops_storage_cache`

Signed-off-by: liang chenye liangchenye@huawei.com

issue.title: update web handler, server side works now
issue.body:
server side is ready for a demo, features includes:
1. a repo owner could add a new app (appA for example)
2. a repo user could list apps of a 'namespace/repo'
3. a repo user could get the meta info of the whole 'namespace/repo'
4. a repo user could get the signature file of the meta info from step 3, and verify it
5. a repo user could get 'appA' uploaded by the repo owner
6. a repo user could verify appA and meta info by meta.signature 

TODO:
implement client side and then merge to dockyard handler.
Signed-off-by: liang chenye liangchenye@huawei.com
